long_description: The powerful Black Diamond Titan lantern lights up your climbing basecamp or a backyard party with bright, ambient light. Frosted globe and dual reflectors effectively capture and put out LED light; wide 45 ft. diameter lighting area illuminates basecamps and backyards. QuadPower LED puts out 250 lumens on high and 16 lumens on low. 4 D-cell batteries (sold separately) provide up to 24 hrs. of runtime on high and 168 hrs. on low. Fine-tune your lighting needs with the dimming switch-simply hold down the on/off button to activate dimmer. Collapsible design saves space in your car and protects on/off button from accidental activation. Unique double-hook hanging system on top provides a simple and secure thread-through or clip-in attachment point for string, fabric loops or branches. Wide base with rubber accents stabilizes the lantern when set on a table or the ground. Battery power indicator shows you how much battery life remains. Black Diamond Titan lantern runs on 4 D batteries, sold separately; base of lantern unscrews to reveal battery compartment.
short_description: The powerful Black Diamond Titan lantern lights up your climbing basecamp or a backyard party with bright, ambient light.
